mapper.sql: uuid, id, label_uuid, ref_uuid, ref_type, create_user_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select l.uuid,l.name from label_ref lr left join label l on lr.label_uuid = l.uuid where lr.ref_uuid = #{refUUID}
select l.uuid as labelUUID , l.name from label_ref lr left join label l on lr.label_uuid = l.uuid where lr.ref_type = #{type} group by l.uuid, l.name
select w.* from label_ref lr left join word w on lr.ref_uuid = w.uuid where lr.label_uuid = #{uuid} and lr.ref_type = 2
select uuid as labelUUID, name, create_time from label where uuid in (select collection_uuid as uuid from package_card_ref pcr where package_uuid = #{packageUUId}) and create_user_id = #{userId}
